bodydiv.p: The due process requirements are built on the following principles:

li.p: transparency—the Board and the Interpretations Committee conduct their activities in a transparent manner;
full and fair consultation—considering the perspectives of stakeholders globally; and
accountability—the Board analyses the potential effects of its proposals on affected parties and explains the rationale for the decisions it reached in developing or amending an IFRS Standard.
